Menu.name: Signature Burger
Menu.description: Our signature burger features a juicy beef patty, crisp lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, cheddar cheese, and our special sauce on a toasted brioche bun.

Menu.name: Margherita Pizza
Menu.description: A classic pizza with fresh basil, tomato sauce, and mozzarella cheese on our homemade thin crust.

Menu.name: Spaghetti & Meatballs
Menu.description: Tender spaghetti noodles tossed in a rich tomato sauce, served with savory meatballs made from ground beef and Italian seasoning.

Menu.name: Spaghetti & Soya Pieces
Menu.description: A vegetarian delight! Spaghetti noodles in a creamy garlic sauce, topped with sautéed soya pieces and fresh herbs.

Menu.name: Classic Cheeseburger
Menu.description: A classic burger with a juicy beef patty, cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and our special sauce on a sesame seed bun.

Menu.name: Pepperoni Pizza
Menu.description: A classic pizza topped with spicy pepperoni slices, tomato sauce, and mozzarella cheese on our homemade thin crust.

Menu.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
Menu.description: A hearty dish featuring spaghetti noodles tossed in a rich meat sauce made with ground beef, tomatoes, and Italian herbs.

Menu.name: Vegetable Spaghetti
Menu.description: Spaghetti noodles tossed with a medley of fresh vegetables like bell peppers, zucchini, and mushrooms in a light garlic sauce.

Menu.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
Menu.description: A juicy beef patty topped with crispy bacon, melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, and our signature sauce on a toasted brioche bun.

Menu.name: Vegetarian Pizza
Menu.description: A vegetarian's delight! This pizza is loaded with fresh vegetables like bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and olives on a tomato sauce base.

Menu.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
Menu.description: Fettuccine noodles tossed in a rich and creamy Alfredo sauce, topped with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley.

Menu.name: Thai Basil Noodles
Menu.description: Rice noodles stir-fried with fresh basil, bell peppers, onions, and your choice of protein (chicken or soya) in a savory Thai sauce.

Menu.name: Akuzike Signature Burger
Menu.description: Our signature burger features a juicy beef patty, crispy bacon, caramelized onions, cheddar cheese, and our special Akuzike sauce on a toasted brioche bun.

Menu.name: Akuzike Supreme Pizza
Menu.description: A loaded pizza with pepperoni, Italian sausage, bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, and black olives on a homemade thin crust.

Menu.name: Akuzike Spaghetti Meatballs
Menu.description: Spaghetti noodles tossed in a rich marinara sauce, served with savory meatballs made from ground beef and Italian herbs.

Menu.name: Akuzike Veggie Pasta
Menu.description: Penne pasta tossed with a medley of fresh vegetables like bell peppers, zucchini, mushrooms, and spinach in a creamy pesto sauce.

Menu.name: Revel Signature Burger
Menu.description: A juicy beef patty topped with grilled pineapple, crispy bacon, cheddar cheese, and our signature Revel sauce on a toasted brioche bun.

Menu.name: Revel Meat Lovers Pizza
Menu.description: A pizza loaded with pepperoni, Italian sausage, bacon, and ham on a homemade thin crust with a blend of mozzarella and cheddar cheese.

Menu.name: Revel Chicken Alfredo
Menu.description: Fettuccine noodles tossed in a rich and creamy Alfredo sauce with grilled chicken, topped with grated Parmesan cheese and fresh parsley.

Menu.name: Revel Veggie Lo Mein
Menu.description: Lo mein noodles stir-fried with a mix of fresh vegetables like bell peppers, carrots, broccoli, and mushrooms in a savory soy-based sauce.

Menu.name: Hot Grill Classic Burger
Menu.description: A classic burger with a juicy beef patty, lettuce, tomatoes, pickles, and our signature Hot Grill sauce on a toasted sesame seed bun.

Menu.name: Hot Grill BBQ Chicken Pizza
Menu.description: A pizza with a BBQ sauce base, topped with grilled chicken, red onions, and a blend of mozzarella and cheddar cheese on our homemade thin crust.

Menu.name: Hot Grill Spaghetti Meatballs
Menu.description: Spaghetti noodles tossed in a rich marinara sauce, served with savory meatballs made from ground beef and Italian seasoning.

Menu.name: Hot Grill Vegetable Stir Fry
Menu.description: A medley of fresh vegetables like bell peppers, broccoli, and carrots, stir-fried with rice noodles in a savory teriyaki sauce.
